replies.msg:
Inter are finalizing the signing of Cagliari midfielder Nicolò Barella. The Italian midfielder has a price-tag of € 50 million but Inter want to lower his price adding some players in the deal. Calciomercato.com exclusively revealed the details of the last meeting between Inter and Cagliari last week and today, Marotta and Ausilio have met Giulini to discuss the future steps of the negotiations.

The deal is close, Inter believe that the competition of Napoli and Chelsea has finally been beaten but today another meeting is being scheduled.

Representatives of Boca Juniors, in fact, have just landed in Milan to discuss the sale of Nahitan Nandez, a 23-year-old midfielder who has a € 20 million price-tag.

Nandez is a possible replacement for Nicolò Barella and Cagliari could finalize his signing together with Inter who are also discussing the details of the deal with Boca.

Tomorrow Cagliari president Tommaso Giulini will also meet the directors of Boca Juniors.

講到似層層

Inter are looking to add to several areas of the squad, and have some targets in the Premier League in mind. Leicester‘s Adrien Silva is an option, having played two matches during the season. Gagliardini could depart, and Silva would serve as a replacement for the midfield. Matteo Darmian from Manchester United could come to reinforce Inter’s defense, and the Red Devils have named their price: €6 million loan plus €6 million purchase option, with the player‘s full wages being taken on. The price is steep for Inter, as it was for Juventus who had also made advances for Darmian in recent days. Inter will continue to monitor the situation, as he would be considered a replacement player for the back line should Miranda depart the club.

The price is steep for Inter, as it was for Juventus who had also made advances for Darmian in recent days. Inter will continue to monitor the situation, as he would be considered a replacement player for the back line should Miranda depart the club.

Ex-Inter Striker Daniel Osvaldo: “If Guarin Wasn’t There I Would’ve Punched Mauro Icardi”
Retired former Inter striker, Pablo Osvaldo, who now enjoys his life as a rock star musician after feeling like ‘a fish out of water’ in the world of football looks back at his career in an interview with Fuorigioco.“No regrets, not one, the ball has given me so much and I’m proud of it, even if I realized that that being a footballer is not a real life, but I played for many top clubs, with great champions, I also wore the Azzurri shirt.”“And despite the 9 goals in the qualifiers, I did not go to the 2010 World Cup for reasons that maybe not even Prandelli, the coach, could have explained to you, and then we saw that we did not do so well.”Besides scoring goals, Osvaldo was known for his temper on and off the field, including the time he fought with Inter teammate, Mauro Icardi in a game against Juventus. When asked if he would do it again Osvaldo said: “It is very easy to say no now. If Guarin hadn’t been there to stop me I would have punched Mauro hard. In that moment that’s how I felt. Then Mancini asked to sell me so as to not lose control of the group.”

成立於2017年，由於蘇寧控股集團（深交所：002024）重組，蘇寧體育是通過整合前蘇寧體育媒體和培訓業務，智慧設備（OTT）業務和新推出的運動零售業務而組成的領先的體育媒體公司。 蘇寧體育自2015年開始運營一款中國內地主流的的體育視頻流應用程式，PP 體育。其目前已與幾乎全部國際足球聯賽簽訂獨家轉播合約。公司總部位於中國南京。

我們非常高興地宣布，近日萊恩資本（LionRock Capital）已與ISC香港公司達成協議，收購其所持有的31.05%國際米蘭足球俱樂部股份。從而，萊恩資本成為國際米蘭新的少數股東。

作為一家專業的投資機構，我們非常看好體育及相關產業的發展前景並致力於投資體育行業的領導者。在足球領域，國際米蘭是一家擁有全球影響力的百年豪門，其深厚的歷史底蘊和巨大的發展潛力令人興奮。過去三年來，在大股東蘇寧的引領下，國際米蘭無論在競技表現、品牌價值、商業實力還是媒體創新等方面，都取得了全方位的提升。萊恩資本高度認同國際米蘭的發展目標，那就是將國際米蘭打造成兼具競技實力與商業影響力的全球頂級俱樂部。我們非常高興能夠加入國際米蘭大家庭，支持俱樂部為全球內拉和熱愛體育運動的人帶來高品質的體驗。

The Gunners have now set their sights on Ivan Perisic, they have offered Inter €5 million for a loan until end of the season with an option to buy set at €40 million. The nerazzurri have turned down this proposal as they are currently only interested in moving the Croatian winger on a permanent sale.

Inter meanwhile are continuing their push for Yannick Carrasco. The sides are looking to bring this complex negotiation to an end. In an effort to convince Dalian Yifang, the nerazzurri have offered Antonio Candreva as part of the deal. Candreva‘s agents have admitted that the player could be on the way out of Italy.

On Monday morning Inter will meet with Udinese over Rodrigo de Paul, who they are looking to bring in next summer. However, if Perisic leaves in January they could advance on him sooner. There is already competition for de Paul, with Napoli offering €30 million plus Younas to Udinese.

Inter Make Conte Contact

Inter chief executive Giuseppe ‘Beppe’ Marotta and club president Steven Zhang have made initial contact with Antonio Conte with regard to becoming Inter manager starting next season according to a report from CalcioMercato.com.Pressure is seemingly building on Inter manager Luciano Spalletti after two poor results and the Nerazzurri management are seemingly taking the first steps toward going down a new path come the end of the season.Conte was linked with taking over at Inter prior to Spalletti’s appointment in 2017 but could be set to be reunited with Marotta, who he worked with at Juventus.The former Italian national team manager is currently without a job having been sacked by Premier League side Chelsea in the Summer where he was succeeded by Maurizio Sarri.49-year-old Conte last managed at club level in Italy in 2014 and left for the Italian national team job having led Juventus to three straight Serie A titles.

Inter Will Agree To Perisic-Ozil Loan Swap If Arsenal Help Pay Ozil’s Wages
Inter Will Agree To Perisic-Ozil Loan Swap If Arsenal Help Pay Ozil’s Wages January 28, 2019 15:00 ( 0 Comments ) Inter are willing to agree to a loan swap deal with Arsenal involving Ivan Perisic and Mesut Ozil, so long as the Gunners pay half of Ozil’s bumper salary according to a report from British newspaper the Daily Star.Ozil has endured a difficult time at the club since Unai Emery took charge in the Summer and currently earns £350,000 (approximately €400,000) a week. Inter are unwilling to pay that and want the Premier League side to assist them in order for any deal to take place.The report goes on to add that Arsenal wish to take Perisic on loan for the remainder of the season with an option to turn the move permanent but it does not state if Inter have similar intentions for Ozil.Various other reports in the media have suggested that Inter will not entertain Arsenal simply only having an option to keep the Croatian and would rather Arsenal were obliged to make it permanent.

冇記錯呢位巴打好似係資深粉絲黎，可能你經歷隊波既黑暗期耐我地好多所以冇咩感覺
但觀點唔同咪唔回復囉，唔駛係到單單打打嘅

無錯，我的確睇呢隊閪波成15 年😂😂😂
當年國米真係好多大陸球迷，
得閒都會上去百度睇下留言，先會覺得同強國憤青差唔多
其實每次輸波都輸到無咩感覺
呢隊閪波年年重要關頭都會閪幾場
認真睇既話年年都會爆血管
無論揸住咩教練咩球員
都係一鳩樣係咁
我地可以先炒阿仙奴3 粒，輸鳩返1-5 歐聯出局
就算揸住伊巴艾祖對住降班隊射極都唔入0-0
只係09 10 年咁好彩請到老豆返黎教拎三冠
先令到咁多人對隊閪波咁多遐想
要支持對西波做到佛系好似莫拉蒂咁真係好難
莫拉蒂就算輸波，教練教得差，球員踢得差，
都唔會反曬面咁，依然笑笑口咁科水支持隊波
以前莫拉蒂贏得唔少專重就係因為對教練，球員關係好好
睇見某d 會員（其實我都唔記得邊個）話鎖jm ，簡達華locker 趕人走真係得啖笑
自問當年仲係資歷淺睇撚住雲達美迪 哥利斯馬呢堆鳩翼亂鳩咁斬，亂鳩咁射，閪起上黎仲衰過簡達華
呢對閪波經歷過唔少，年年輸幾場重要閪波都睇到慣曬
或者咁講，依家睇到咁開可能真係受到班主影響
閪波輸完一兩場咪算囉，又唔洗講到又要鎖人locker 趕人走咁款既

replies.msg:
低潮期呢幾年乜都試過晒，聯賽第9都試過，我都試過輸到淡，馬沙利果時場場悶到訓著，但都照3點起身睇波。

不過我成日覺得，球迷同球隊係無利益瓜葛，唔係邊個幫邊個打工，所以先會有最真既投入，所以先會嬲會屌，唔同幫國米打工、投資既人。如果連球迷都無所謂，輸到覺得是但，咁班管理層、球員點解要同你搏，打份工姐。

莫拉堤係好，科咁多水場場睇波，成日去訓練場，國米同佢家族分唔開咁濟，但始終隊波佢有份，佢梗係要咁做 每個人處事同情感表達都唔同，森多個痴線佬班主就係一個例子。

咁我都覺得唔洗趕人走既，人一日係國米，落得場都想佢踢得好。
算啦 新年流流 大家對隊波既表達方式唔同 無話邊個錯
